mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where qnaid=#{qnaid}
update qna set content=#{content}, aregdate=now() where qnaid=#{qnaid}
update qna set content=null where aregdate = null where qnaid=#{qnaid}
mapper.select: select * from qna where content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') or title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%');
select * from qna where qwriter like CONCAT('%',#{writer}, '%') or awriter like CONCAT('%',#{writer}, '%');
